artist: Author: Joe Biel , et al.; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and a photomechanical illustration of a figure isolated from other figures printed in offset lithography on peach wove paper covers; 62 pp.
title: Don't Be Retarded, no. 1: Autistic Pride in a Neurophobic World
